title: True dual SIM on Pixel 5
content:
I would love to buy Pixel 4 because I really do like the design but I can't buy it due to no true dual SIM support. I was waiting for dual SIM support every single Pixel phone release but no soap...

A bit less I mind no 3.5mm Jack support but I would like it there, too. I think that even more people would also love to have true dual SIM on Pixel.
Is it a big problem? What about 2 versions of Pixel:
1. dual SIM
2. SIM+eSIM

Would it be possible to get it on Pixel 5 (that would have similar design to Pixel 4), please? (I don't like 4a :))

I wish this thread would be read by someone from Google. :)
